title: Founder and lead instructor
text: Gentiana Susaj is a networker, pathfinder, and founder advocating for anti-violence initiatives and supporting mechanisms. She is an HR lawyer, Aikido black belt, empowerment trainer specialized in Self Defense and IMPACT Personal Safety.(link to full bio) - Gentiana Susaj is a Human Rights Lawyer with post-university studies in International Migration, Human Rights and Development. With over 20 years of experience on anti-human trafficking, gender and refugee issues in Europe and Latin America, she began combining her experience in human rights with the Aikido to empower victims of trafficking, particularly women and girls; she founded Aikido Albania the first woman-led martial arts center in Albania.
